start: Welcome to PassStorage. Here you can store you passwords and personal data and don't care about confidentiality.
pass_info: Set up your password: URL: {0} Login: {1} Password: {2} Description: {3}
set_time: Enter delay before delete in seconds. Current delay: {0}. Minimal delay is {1}. Maximal delay is {2}. If delay more than maximal delay, messages won't be deleted. Messages sent before changing delay will remain previous delay.
